dialogue.name: Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: How did you two get here?

dialogue.name: Deemo
dialogue.text: We are collecting garbage in the ocean and somehow we discovered this island.

dialogue.name: Zed
dialogue.text: Now that you ask us, it's our turn to ask you why are you here?

dialogue.name: Captain Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: I am Sylvia Stormrider. I collect treasures all around the world. Any treasure has a value, but there is only one that is worth immeasurable to me. This island.

dialogue.name: Zed
dialogue.text: You mean you own this island? That means we are trespassing here!!

dialogue.name: Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: That doesnâ€™t matter. The island is full of garbage now and I cannot solve this problem.

dialogue.name: Deemo
dialogue.text: We can help you with that problem.

dialogue.name: Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: Really? Can you collect 50 garbage? I can give you something or should I say find it.

dialogue.name: Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: Recently a meteor fell in this area. Meteors fetch a high price. It landed on top of the mountain.

dialogue.name: Zed
dialogue.text: That might definitely be the part of the ship. Luck may be with us today. Thank you for your information.

dialogue.name: Sylvia Stormrider
dialogue.text: No problem. You two are also helping me with this garbage problem.
